Title: With a Friend Like Harry...
Writer: Dominik Moll (scenario), Gilles Marchand (scenario), Francis Villain (poem)
Actors: Laurent Lucas, Sergi López, Mathilde Seigner, Sophie Guillemin
Plot: Harry knew Michel in high school; they meet again by accident, Harry inserts himself in Michel's life... and things take a sinister turn.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 wins & 14 nominations.
Production: La Sofica Sofinergie 5, La Procirep, M6 Films Production
